Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its worth to be $12,000. Considering its immense value to you, I am offering it to you for $11,000. This represents a substantial saving of $1,000 compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I trust that this offer will meet your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
